summary.paragraph1: Full-Stack Software Engineer (M.S. Computer Science) specializing in React.js, Node.js, Python, and AWS cloud infrastructure. 3+ years building scalable web applications with proven impact: 27% error reduction, 99.94% uptime, 60% faster reporting.
summary.paragraph2: Featured in CSUF research news for developing machine learning models to manage public disasters and health emergencies on NSF-funded project. Experienced with large language models, LangChain framework, and vector databases.
summary.paragraph3: Strong collaborator in Agile/Scrum teams with ability to rapidly learn new technologies. Seeking to apply technical expertise to advance innovative solutions.
